nodes.text: Hakko Drazlip and the Tootle Froots

Hakko Drazlip and the Tootle Froots was a band that recorded the political song "Vader's Many Prosthetic Parts." Nakari Kelen's mother was a songwriter and backup singer for the band. All members of the band were sent to the spice mines of Kessel days after the song came out.
